title: Leading trailers in the U.S. January 2020 , by weekly TV ad spend
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Spending in million U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 5.
Overall Spending in million U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Spending in million U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 1917 to Dolittle, and lastly roughly constant from Dolittle to Like_a_Boss.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 1917 and Bad_Boys_for_Life.
The highest Spending in million U.S. dollars, of value 10.41 was reached at Year 1917
Minimum Spending in million U.S. dollars about 3.72 was reached at Year Just_Mercy
